patthana1.22:1.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:1.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:2.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:2.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:3.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.22:4.1_0: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha dve), avigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:6.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:6.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:6.1_4: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.22:7.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:7.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.22:8.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.22:8.1_1: (anulomasahajātasadisaṁ, ninnānākaraṇaṁ) napurejātapaccayā—arūpe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca …pe…
patthana1.22:9.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:10.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—bahiddhārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.22:11.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi) …
patthana1.22:12.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.22:12.1_2: navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:13.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.22:14.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane nakamme navipāke najhāne namagge navippayutte dve.
patthana1.22:16.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā dve …pe… navipāke dve, navippayutte dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.22:18.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve …pe…
patthana1.22:21.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:21.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:22.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.22:23.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe…
patthana1.22:23.1_5: Ariyā ajjhattārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.22:23.1_7: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.22:23.1_9: Ajjhattārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:24.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhā viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.22:24.1_1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ bahiddhā dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe…
patthana1.22:24.1_5: anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati, ajjhattārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe…
patthana1.22:24.1_6: cetopariyañāṇena ajjhattārammaṇabahiddhācittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ajjhattārammaṇā bahiddhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:25.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ bahiddhā dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.22:25.1_6: Bahiddhārammaṇe bahiddhā khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe…
patthana1.22:25.1_8: Bahiddhārammaṇā bahiddhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:26.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.22:26.1_1: Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, bahiddhārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.22:26.1_2: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …
patthana1.22:26.1_9: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.22:26.1_11: Bahiddhārammaṇā ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:27.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.22:27.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ajjhattaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.22:27.1_2: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.22:27.1_8: ajjhattārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.22:28.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:29.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:29.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana1.22:29.1_4: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ ajjhattaṁ dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.22:29.1_10: anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, bahiddhārammaṇe ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā ajjhattārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.22:30.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:31.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ bahiddhārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:31.1_1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ bahiddhārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:31.1_2: Ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā bahiddhārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:32.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:33.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— bahiddhārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ ajjhattārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:33.1_1: Bahiddhārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ ajjhattārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:33.1_2: Bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā ajjhattārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:34.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.22:35.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.22:35.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ajjhattārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā, ajjhattārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:36.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.22:36.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ajjhattārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā bahiddhārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:37.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.22:37.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—bahiddhārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā bahiddhārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:38.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.22:38.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—bahiddhārammaṇā aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā ajjhattārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya, dukkhānupassanāya, anattānupassanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:39.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā ajjhattārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:40.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— ajjhattārammaṇaṁ anulomaṁ gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:41.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā bahiddhārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:42.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.22:42.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:43.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:43.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—ajjhattārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:44.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.22:44.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ bahiddhārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:45.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:45.1_1: Nānākkhaṇikā—bahiddhārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.22:46.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.22:47.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke dve …pe…
patthana1.22:47.1_1: (sabbattha dve), sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate dve.
patthana1.22:49.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …

patthana1.22:52.1_0: Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.22:53.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha cattāri), napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane …pe…
patthana1.22:55.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā dve, naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye naāsevane nakamme …pe…

patthana1.22:57.1_1: sampayutte dve, atthiyā dve, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate dve.
